pt_br.name: Mala
pt_br.description: As malas são essenciais para transportar pertences pessoais em viagens. Tradicionalmente feitas de couro, madeira ou lona, elas oferecem resistência e durabilidade em diversos tamanhos e formatos.

en.name: Suitcase
en.description: Suitcases are essential accessories for transporting personal belongings while traveling. They come in various sizes, shapes, and materials, from small carry-ons to large travel trunks. Traditionally, suitcases were made of leather, wood, or canvas for durability and strength.

es.name: Maleta
es.description: Las maletas son esenciales para transportar pertenencias personales en viajes. Tradicionalmente hechas de cuero, madera o lona, ofrecen resistencia y durabilidad en varios tamaños y formas.
